explains: v. 回复，恢复（到原来状态、情况或做法）（revert to）；（财产、权力、金钱等）归还；皈依（伊斯兰教）；返祖遗传
wordGroup: revert to type 返祖 , ◎返祖 , ◎恢复原状

sentences.en: Otherwise, they revert to graphite or burn.
sentences.cn: 否则，它们会变成石墨或燃烧。

sentences.en: Thanks to slowing population growth, land currently ploughed up for crops might be able to revert to forest or wilderness.
sentences.cn: 由于人口增长放缓，目前用于种植作物的土地可能会变成森林或荒野。

sentences.en: We also revert to old practices when we're under stress.
sentences.cn: 当我们处于压力之下时，也很容易回归到旧的习惯上去。
